traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
